fields_of_interest: Trade, Competition, Business and Industry, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives: InterDigital participates globally in activities associated with wireless communications research and development.  We are following the Digital Single Market agenda and telecoms standardization issues, in particular 5G issues and any other spectrum, broadband, patent or IP matters that might be considered by the EU Commission.

position: Director, Government Relations & Regulatory Affairs, Europe
goals__remit: InterDigital develops technologies that are at the core of mobile devices, networks, and services worldwide. We solve many of the industry's most critical and complex technical challenges, inventing solutions for more efficient broadband networks and a richer multimedia experience years ahead of market deployment. InterDigital has licenses and strategic relationships with many of the world's leading wireless companies. Founded in 1972, InterDigital is listed on NASDAQ and is included in the S&P MidCap 400® index.  Our goal is to become more involved with the EU and the policies that affect our company in Europe and globally.
